abstract.text: Sets the exposure mode to a custom state, and locks exposure duration and ISO at explicit values.

Pass a value of

A callback the system invokes when the adjustment to the exposure duration and ISO is complete. If you call this method multiple times, the system calls the completion handlers in FIFO order.
The system passes a time value that matches that of the first buffer to which its applied all settings. It synchronizes the timestamp to the device clock, and you must convert the timestamp to the

This method throws an exception if you set the exposure duration or ISO values to an unsupported level

to acquire exclusive access to the device’s configuration properties. Otherwise, setting the value of this property raises an exception. When you finish configuring the device, call
to release the lock and allow other devices to configure the settings.

abstract.text: Work with audiovisual assets, control device cameras, process audio, and configure system audio interactions.
An object that represents a hardware or virtual capture device like a camera or microphone.
A mode where an app manually sets the exposure duration and ISO values.
A mode that locks exposure for the device.
The maximum exposure duration, in seconds, defined in the autoexposure algorithm.
The currently active maximum frame duration.
The currently active minimum frame duration.
A special constant representing the current exposure duration setting.
A constant to indicate not to specify a new ISO value, and instead set it to its current value.
The length of time over which exposure takes place.
The current exposure ISO value.
The size of the lens diaphragm.
Requests exclusive access to configure device hardware properties.
Sets the exposure mode to a custom state, and locks exposure duration and ISO at explicit values.
Releases exclusive control over device hardware properties.
A capture output for still image, Live Photos, and other photography workflows.
Priority is balanced between photo quality and speed of delivery.
Speed of photo delivery is most important, even at the expense of quality.
A specification of the features and settings to use for a single photo capture request.
A setting that indicates how to prioritize photo quality against speed of photo delivery.
A clock to use for output synchronization.
A capture output that records video and provides access to video frames for processing.
A structure that represents time.
A single-precision, floating-point value type.
The return type of functions that don’t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.
